author: mtoda8639
content:
Hey all - want to verify something regarding ETH2 withdrawal keys. Is it OK to re-use the same withdrawal key for multiple validators? 
I.e. if we are generating many validator nodes, each with different validator keys, but the same withdrawal key, we will be able to use the single withdrawal key to successfully claim funds once the network supports it?

author: djrtwo
content: It is safe, but it does leak information that the validators are tied together

author: djrtwo
content: if you use the standard EIPs for key-generation then it will use a separate withdrawal key for each validator

author: djrtwo
content: that said, it is safe, just not standard, to reuse the withdrawal cred

author: mtoda8639
content: Thanks - we aren't able to use the standard EIPs unfortunately as we are using threshold multisig keys as withdrawal keys
